FuncDef: The aaa route-download now force command enables the Router to immediately synchronize static routes with those delivered by the RADIUS server.
Examples: [~HUAWEI] aaa route-download server-group test base-user-name huawei password cipher Root@123 download-interval 1200 retry-interval 25 retry-max-count 5 tag 10 synchronization 03:45:00
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you want the device to immediately synchronize static routes with those delivered by the RADIUS server, you can run the aaa route-download now force.
Prerequisites
The device was enabled to periodically synchronize static routes with those delivered by the RADIUS server and corresponding parameters using the aaa route-download command.
Configuration Impact
After this command is run, static routes will be synchronized immediately once. This configuration will not be written into the configuration file.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The aaa route-download now force command takes effect only when the delivery status of the static routes is ready. This command does not take effect when the delivery status of the static routes is downloading. To view the delivery status of static routes, run the display aaa route-download config command.
